hackathon-description-text: On August 9th at 5 PM, developers, designers, product managers and others will come together for 24 hours to create applications to combat climate change. This event is open to everyone with an idea so don’t worry if you do not have a technical background. Teams can be formed during the day to bring the best ideas together.

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: 1 week’s worth of satellite time, courtesy of Nanosatisfi, with access to camera, magnetometer, gyroscope, accelerometer, Infrared Temperature Sensor and others.
RallyPad co-working space for 4 months for free.

hackathon-description-header: The world’s best developers and designers will use their talent and creativity to create innovative approaches to combat climate change.
